body_html:
It actually says that the precompiled binaries were released with CUDA 8, it doesn't mention the issue of supporting it. The fix seemed to have been merged a while back, but it's still not clear if there is support for it or not.
@MikulasZelinka - did you run it through some testing to see if it actually performs as expected?
Can someone from the TF team respond and say if it should work properly when compiled against CUDA 9 and cuDNN 7?
Thanks 👍

body:
It actually says that the precompiled binaries were released with CUDA 8, it doesn't mention the issue of supporting it. The fix seemed to have been merged a while back, but it's still not clear if there is support for it or not. 
@MikulasZelinka - did you run it through some testing to see if it actually performs as expected?
Can someone from the TF team respond and say if it should work properly when compiled against CUDA 9 and cuDNN 7?
Thanks 👍
